title: Almond lentil stew
description: This easy vegetarian lentil stew is served with cherry tomatoes and cinnamon-flavoured almonds.This meal is low calorie  and if served as four portions provides 351 kcal, 20g protein, 37g carbohydrate (of which 7.5g sugars), 14g fat (of which 1.5g saturates), 11.5g fibre and 1.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for frying the almonds
